text: Syed Ahmed (March 6, 1945 - September 27, 2015) was an Indian politician, author and a member of the Congress Party. He was sworn in as the sixteenth Governor of Manipur on May 16, 2015, but only served four months before dying of cancer in office on September 27. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in India Category:Governors of Jharkhand Category:Governors of Manipur
title: Syed Ahmed (politician)
